alert.note: Alert for Fond du Lac; Green Lake (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 5:23PM CDT until July 23 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Green Lake County in south central Wisconsin... Northwestern Fond du Lac County in east central Wisconsin... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 522 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Redgranite to near Ripon to near Brandon, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fond Du Lac, Ripon, Berlin, North Fond Du Lac, Rosendale, Green Lake, Brandon, Southern Lake Winnebago, Lamartine, Eldorado, Fairwater, Van Dyne, Lagoda and West Rosendale. People attending The Fond du Lac County Fair should seek safe shelter immediately! HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
